    • Method Detail

      • doWork

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> doWork(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> workerMap)
        Description copied from interface: com.lars_albrecht.foldergen.plugin.interfaces.IFolderGenPlugin
        CONFEXTENSION: You only need to return null. You became a HashMap with "additionalData" (HashMap), "rootFolder" (File), "name" (String) and "chain" (ArrayList)
        CONTENTEXTENSION: you need to return a HashMap with key "content" and became a HashMap with "content".
        Returns:
        HashMap

      • getAdditionlInfo

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getAdditionlInfo(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.String> basicInfo)
        Description copied from interface: com.lars_albrecht.foldergen.plugin.interfaces.IFolderGenPlugin
        Returns additional info if return not null. basicInfo is a HashMap. It contains the BASICINFO_* statics.
        Returns:
        HashMap

      • getItemTitle

        public java.lang.String getItemTitle(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.String> basicInfo)
        Description copied from interface: com.lars_albrecht.foldergen.plugin.interfaces.IFolderGenPlugin
        Returns the title for the item in file. In basic plugins you return basicInfo.get(IFolderGenPlugin.BASICINFO_FILETITLE).trim();
        Returns:
        String

        public java.lang.Integer getPluginType()
